mapper.select: SELECT a.menu_seq, a.menu_date, a.menu_when, a.menu_total, a.menu_gram, b.food_name, b.food_car, b.food_pro, b.food_fat, b.food_sugar, b.food_na, b.food_col, b.food_kcal FROM tb_menu_list a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_food b ON a.food_seq = b.food_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_member c ON a.mem_seq = c.mem_seq WHERE a.mem_seq = #{mem_seq} and a.menu_when=#{menu_when} and a.menu_date=#{menu_date}
